Class VendingMachine

java.lang.Object
  VendingMachine

public class VendingMachine
extends java.lang.Object

Creates a vending machine object that allows tokens to be put in and soda cans to come out Abdallah Alishah 18 September 2014

Constructor Summary
VendingMachine(int maxCans)
          Initializes the maximum amount of cans the vending can hold

          An example of a method - replace this comment with your own that describes the operation of the method

 int getTokens()
          Returns the amount of tokens that have been inserted into the vending machine
 void insertToken()
          Inserts a token into the vending and adds 1 to token count but if the remaining cans left less than 0 then it adds one to token count but nobody gets a can :P

Inserts a token into the vending and adds 1 to token count but if the remaining cans left less than 0 then it adds one to token count but nobody gets a can :P
